General.Name: Bonei Hatichon Civil Engineering and Infrastructures Ltd
General.Description: Bonei Hatichon Civil Engineering & Infrastructures Ltd. operates as a real estate company in Israel. It develops, markets, and manages residential, commercial, and luxury buildings. The company is also involved in locating, promoting, and executing urban renewal projects. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Holon, Israel.

2.Name: Mr. Ran  Malach
2.Title: Legal Adviser & Company Sec., Chief Exec. Officer of Urban Renewal
